overview: We are in 2019 and in the international socio-political panorama, conflicts and threats are manifested that perhaps we did not conceive a decade ago. The world is changing, migration and its counterpoint, xenophobia, are issues present in almost any sphere or discourse that is part of our present time. In this documentary, the filmmaker interviews people who speak about the clash between culture and homosexuality, religion and gender identity, violence and freedom.
title: Diversitats i terres
